${ModID}:CursedLands.NAME: Cursed Lands
${ModID}:CursedLands.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL They are ${ModID}:Perilous this turn.

${ModID}:GrandHeist.DESCRIPTION: Roll a *D8. NL Add a *Spirit *Stone to your hand.
${ModID}:GrandHeist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll a *D8. NL Add !M! *Spirit *Stones to your hand.

${ModID}:StoneWards.NAME: Stone Wards

${ModID}:ShimmerShield.NAME: Shimmer Shield
${ModID}:ShimmerShield.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Roll a *D8.

${ModID}:SpiritStrike.NAME: Spirit Strike
${ModID}:SpiritStrike.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MaliceRising.NAME: Malice Rising
${ModID}:MaliceRising.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL !M! cards in your discard pile become ${ModID}:Perilous.

${ModID}:RiteOfWyld.NAME: Rite of Wyld
${ModID}:RiteOfWyld.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each *Magic card played this combat.

${ModID}:GameOfThorns.NAME: Game of Thorns
${ModID}:GameOfThorns.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to total ${ModID}:Dice rolled this combat to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:GameOfThorns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Unnate. NL Deal damage equal to total ${ModID}:Dice rolled this combat to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SpiritStone.NAME: Spirit Stone
${ModID}:SpiritStone.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. Retain. NL Roll a *D8. NL When 4 *Spirit *Stones are in hand, add a *Spirit *Walker into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SpiritStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Magic. Retain. NL Roll a *D12. NL When 4 *Spirit *Stones are in hand, add a *Spirit *Walker into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SpiritWalker.NAME: Spirit Walker
${ModID}:SpiritWalker.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. Retain. NL Double ${ModID}:Dice value. NL While in hand, *Spirit *Stones play themselves.
